config.title: Global Ignored File & Directory Names
config.description: Add file & directory names that should be excluded globally.

children.title: Ignored Names
children.description: Provide a list of comma separated directory and file names that should be ignored in all workspaces. File names must include the file extension. For example: test.txt, example.js, sample.php.

config.title: Global Ignored File Extensions
config.description: Add file extensions that should be excluded globally.

children.title: Ignored Extensions
children.description: Provide a list of comma separated file extensions that should be ignored. Extensions should include "." before the extension. For example: .txt, .js, .php.

config-workspace.title: Ignored File & Directory Paths
config-workspace.description: Add specific file and directory paths that should be excluded in the current workspace.

children.title: Path
children.description: Select a file or directory path to be ignored in the current workspace.

children.title: Ignored Paths
children.description: Provide a list of comma separated directory and file names that should be ignored by the extension in the current workspace.

config-workspace.title: Ignored File & Directory Names
config-workspace.description: Add file and directory names that should be excluded in the current workspace, regardless of path.

children.title: Ignored Names
children.description: Provide a list of comma separated directory and file names that should be ignored in the current workspace. File names must include the file extension. For example: test.txt, example.js, sample.php.

config-workspace.title: Ignored File Extensions
config-workspace.description: Add file extensions that should be excluded in the current workspace.
